meanings.definition: A fine point, particular, or detail, as in etiquette or conduct.
meanings.sent1: She always pays great attention to every punctilio in her table manners.
meanings.sent2: The royal family follows every punctilio when hosting official events.
meanings.sent3: The punctilio of using the correct fork for each course made him feel like a dining detective.
meanings.sent4: Her punctilio in arranging the flowers was like a painter meticulously working on a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The punctilio of his outfit made him stand out at the formal event.

meanings.definition: Strict observance of formalities or etiquette.
meanings.sent1: His punctilio in addressing elders with respect is admirable.
meanings.sent2: The military ceremony was conducted with great punctilio.
meanings.sent3: The punctilio of bowing three times before entering the dojo seemed a bit excessive to the new student.
meanings.sent4: Her punctilio in following the rules of the game was unmatched, earning her the title of champion.
meanings.sent5: The punctilio of his behavior at the dinner party left a lasting impression on the guests.
